Name: AWS Win - Install Octopus Tentacle
Description:
This step template will install the latest tentacle on an AWS hosted, Windows virtual machine. This will also open the firewall for inbound traffic on port 10933 on the Security Group.
<hr />
*Note: Expects the AWS CLI and Powershell to be installed on the worker running this task*

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.AWSAccount
Parameters.Label: AWS Account
Parameters.HelpText: AWS account with permissions to the virtual machine in which to install the tentacle on

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.awsRegion
Parameters.Label: AWS Region
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the aws region. I.E. `us-east-1`

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.awsSGName
Parameters.Label: Security Group Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the AWS security group to create an exception in

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.awsVmInstanceId
Parameters.Label: VM Instance ID
Parameters.HelpText: The instance ID of the virtual machine to target when

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.octoServerThumb
Parameters.Label: Server Thumbprint
Parameters.HelpText: The Thumbprint of the octopus server

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.octoApiKey
Parameters.Label: Octo User API Key
Parameters.HelpText: The API key used to configure the tentacle.

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.octopusRoles
Parameters.Label: Roles
Parameters.HelpText:
Roles to assign to this tentacle installation.
*Note: Each role should be on it's own line*

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.octopusEnvironments
Parameters.Label: Environments
Parameters.HelpText:
Environments to assign this tentacle installation to.
*Note: Each environment should be on its own line*

Parameters.Name: instrallTentacle.octoServerUrl
Parameters.Label: Octo Server Url
Parameters.HelpText: The server url to register the tentacle with.  Defaults to the base url

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.tentacleType
Parameters.Label: Tentacle Type
Parameters.HelpText: Select between a listening or polling tentacle

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.tentacleHostName
Parameters.Label: Tentacle Host Name
Parameters.HelpText:
The host name to register the listening tentacles with. Octopus deploy server uses this value to reach out to the vm.
*Note: Leave blank to automatically use assigned public IP address.*

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.tentacleName
Parameters.Label: Tentacle Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the tentacle to use in the infrastructure area of octopus deploy.  Will use the host name if not provided

Parameters.Name: awsInstallWinTentacle.portNumber
Parameters.Label: Port Number
Parameters.HelpText: Port number used when installing and registering the tentacle. This is also the port opened on the firewall
